flawed_nl_solution:
To treat his 20 dogs, Mr. Sean charged Khalil 20*$60 = $<<20*60=1200>>1200
Khalil also paid $40*60 = $<<40*60=2040>>2040 to Mr. Sean to treat his cats.
Altogether, Khalil paid Mr. Sean $2040+$1200 = $<<2040+1200=3240>>3240 to treat his pets.
#### 3240

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 2040. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
